MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Chemistry | c: Biology | d: Geology

MCQ: What is one major theme in biology that explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Evolution | c: Respiration | d: Adaptation

MCQ: What do all organisms process that is encoded in genes?
Choices: a: Nutrients | b: Energy | c: Hereditary information | d: Water

MCQ: Which type of organisms are classified as prokaryotic?
Choices: a: Plants | b: Fungi | c: Archaea and bacteria | d: Animals

MCQ: What method do biologists use to study life?
Choices: a: Artistic method | b: Scientific method | c: Philosophical method | d: Mathematical method
